diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Community-associated Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (CA-MRSA) skin/soft tissue infection
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with a 2 cm cutaneous abscess and surrounding cellulitis. The condition improved with incision and drainage, and cultures confirmed MRSA, indicating a CA-MRSA infection likely contracted through skin-to-skin contact related to her occupation as an exotic dancer.
